DESCRIPTION: When a card enters or leaves your hand, increase this by #b1. At the start of your turn, decrease this by #b15.
If the corresponding Wind Speed is reached, expending them will activate the effect.
Reduce the damage you take from enemy attack by #b50%.
If your #yWind #ySpeed is still at the required level, you can continue to use this effect.
A copy of the card with #yExhaust and #yEthereal.
You must have at least #b1 #yFlight to use this card.
Enemy will be #yStunned when has #b3 Tremble.
